stateDiagram

GAME_STARTED

GAME_STARTED : GAME_STARTED

GAME_STARTED : enter / #123; addapter.NotifyAll()#59; #125;

CARD_PLACED

CARD_PLACED : CARD_PLACED

TRUMP_SELECTED

TRUMP_SELECTED : TRUMP_SELECTED

state ENOUGH_CARD_GAME {

        PLAYER

        PLAYER : PLAYER

        TURN_ENDED

        TURN_ENDED : TURN_ENDED

        WINNER

        WINNER : WINNER

        MELT_CHECKED

        MELT_CHECKED : MELT_CHECKED

        TICK_OVER

        TICK_OVER : TICK_OVER

        NEXT_TRICK

        NEXT_TRICK : NEXT_TRICK

        DRAW_CARD

        DRAW_CARD : DRAW_CARD

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as ENOUGH_CARD_GAME.(InitialState)

}

state LAST_9_CARD_GAME {

        L9CG_PLAYER

        L9CG_PLAYER : L9CG_PLAYER

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as LAST_9_CARD_GAME.(InitialState)

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

GAME_STARTED --> CARD_PLACED : do

CARD_PLACED --> TRUMP_SELECTED : do

TRUMP_SELECTED --> ENOUGH_CARD_GAME : do

ENOUGH_CARD_GAME --> LAST_9_CARD_GAME : do

PLAYER --> TURN_ENDED : do

TURN_ENDED --> WINNER : do

WINNER --> MELT_CHECKED : do

MELT_CHECKED --> TICK_OVER : do

TICK_OVER --> NEXT_TRICK : do

ENOUGH_CARD_GAME.(InitialState) --> PLAYER

LAST_9_CARD_GAME.(InitialState) --> L9CG_PLAYER

ROOT.(InitialState) --> GAME_STARTED
Events
settings
